description: My place is close to Westville East, Veselka, Simith, Union Square. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood and the coziness. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers. (Wifi included)
name: Bright 1 Bedroom in the heart of the East Village
review: I was really comfortable in Elizabeth's place and she was always available by text for all my questions. Cozy room clean bed and many towels available for our stay. I mainly loved the idea of column of books by the bed :)
